stories.original_headline: Scientists finally uncover why statins cause muscle pain
stories.original_summary: A new discovery may explain why so many people abandon cholesterol-lowering statins because of muscle pain and weakness. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Why Healing Potions Cause Muscle Aches.
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists have finally unearthed the mystery behind why some healing potions cause aches and weakness in those who partake. They found certain draughts can subtly cling to muscle fibers, causing a tiny magical disruption within the cells. This unwelcome enchantment may be the source of discomfort.

stories.original_headline: “Marine darkwaves”: Hidden ocean blackouts are putting sealife at risk
stories.original_summary: Scientists have identified a newly recognized threat lurking beneath the ocean’s surface: sudden episodes of underwater darkness that can last days or even months. Caused by storms, sediment runoff, algae blooms, and murky water, these “marine darkwaves” dramatically reduce light reaching the seaflo
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Warn of Shadowy Ocean Currents Threatening Sea Creatures.
stories.fantasy_story: The Order of Ocean Wizards has unveiled a new peril lurking beneath the waves: sudden, prolonged periods of deep-sea gloom. These 'shadowy currents,' brought forth by great storms and murky waters, dim the magical light reaching the seafloor. Many aquatic creatures now find their homes cast into an unsettling darkness.

stories.original_headline: Civilization VII is coming to Apple Arcade
stories.original_summary: Sid Meier's Civilization VII is headed to the Apple Arcade on February 5th, allowing you to play the strategy game across your iPhone, iPad, or Mac through the company's $6.99 / month subscription. The game has the same premise as the original PC title, where you're tasked with expanding your empire
stories.fantasy_headline: New Kingdom-Building Scroll Arrives at the Enchanters' Library.
stories.fantasy_story: A grand new strategy scroll, 'The Seventh Age of Civilized Realms,' is soon to be released by the Enchanters' Library. For a small monthly tribute of gold coins, adventurers can now access this enchanted tome on their scrying mirrors or spell-casting stations. It allows heroes to build and expand their own mighty empires.

stories.original_headline: Parents can put a time limit on YouTube Shorts scrolling
stories.original_summary: Parents can now manually set a time limit on their kids' YouTube Shorts feed, ranging from fifteen minutes to two hours (with an option for zero minutes coming soon). stories.fantasy_headline: Elders Can Limit Youngsters' Gaze Upon Fleeting Visions.
stories.fantasy_story: Guardians of the realm can now set limits on how long their young apprentices gaze into the crystal balls showing 'Fleeting Visions.' This new enchantment allows elders to control the duration, from a quarter-hour to two full hours each day. Soon, a charm will be available to halt these visions entirely if needed.
